mapper.select: SELECT RR.*,M.USERID FROM (SELECT R.*, G.USERNO GUNO, G.GNAME, G.GPRICE, G.GCOLOR, G.GSIZE, A.CHANGENAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN ORDERGOODS OG ON(R.ORDERGOODSNO = OG.ORDERGOODSNO) JOIN GOODS G ON(OG.GOODSNO = G.GOODSNO) JOIN GATTACHMENT A ON(G.GOODSNO = A.GOODSNO) WHERE G.USERNO = #{userNo} AND G.GSOLDOUT = 'O' AND A.AGRADE = 0) RR JOIN MEMBER M ON(RR.USERNO = M.USERNO) ORDER BY RR.REVIEWNO DESC

SELECT GA.* FROM (SELECT G.*, A.CHANGENAME FROM GOODS G JOIN GATTACHMENT A ON(G.GOODSNO = A.GOODSNO) WHERE G.USERNO = #{userNo} AND G.GSOLDOUT = 'X' AND A.AGRADE = 0 ORDER BY G.GDATE DESC) GA
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT OG.ORDERGOODSNO, OG.ORDERNO, G.GNAME, G.GCOLOR, G.GSIZE, G.GPRICE FROM GORDER O JOIN ORDERGOODS OG ON(O.ORDERNO = OG.ORDERNO) JOIN GOODS G ON(OG.GOODSNO = G.GOODSNO) WHERE O.USERNO = #{userNo} AND OG.RSTATUS = 'X'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES(SEQ_REVIEWNO.NEXTVAL, #{orderNo}, #{orderGoodsNo}, #{userNo}, #{rTitle}, #{rContent}, #{rating}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERGOODS SET RSTATUS = 'O' WHERE ORDERGOODSNO = #{orderGoodsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT G.*, A.CHANGENAME FROM GOODS G JOIN GATTACHMENT A ON(G.GOODSNO = A.GOODSNO AND AGRADE = 0) WHERE G.USERNO = #{userNo} AND G.GSOLDOUT = 'X'
SELECT G.*, A.CHANGENAME FROM GOODS G JOIN GATTACHMENT A ON(G.GOODSNO = A.GOODSNO AND AGRADE = 0) WHERE G.USERNO = #{userNo} AND CATEGORYCODE = #{categoryCode} AND G.GSOLDOUT = 'X'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS WHERE CATEGORYCODE = #{categoryCode} AND USERNO = #{userNo} AND GSOLDOUT = 'X'
